author: Omar Rashid
text:
Mayawati says it is difficult for Dalits to get justice in the country

Bahujam Samaj Party supremo Mayawati on Wednesday condemned the “injustice and harassment” meted out to Dalit scholar Rohith Vemula, terming his suicide another “painful example” of the BJP’s “extreme” casteist, “hateful” and anti-Dalit mentality.

Ms. Mayawati said it “is becoming increasingly difficult for the Dalit society to get justice” in the country.
title: ‘An example of BJP’s anti-Dalit mentality’
